name: @itk-wasm/htj2k-build
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:wasi && npm run bindgen:typescript
scripts.bindgen:typescript: itk-wasm -b emscripten-build bindgen --output-dir typescript --package-version 0.1.0 --package-name @itk-wasm/htj2k --package-description "Read and write High-throughput JPEG2000 (HTJ2K) images." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKIOOpenJPH'
scripts.bindgen:python: itk-wasm -b wasi-build bindgen --package-version 0.1.0 --language python --output-dir python --package-name itkwasm-htj2k --package-description "Read and write High-throughput JPEG2000 (HTJ2K) images." --repository "https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKIOOpenJPH"
